items.title: Subhadip Nandy संग Bank Nifty पर बनाएं Strategy, ITC क्यूं बना उनका पसंदीदा Stock? | CNBC Awaaz
items.description:
#CNBCAwaazLive #BusinessNewsLive #StockMarket #ShareMarketToday 

Subhadip Nandy से जानें Nifty Bank पर कैसे खरीदारी करने का मौका निवेशकों को यहां मिल रहा है। किस Strategy के साथ आप यहां आगे बढ़ सकते हैं। वहीं ITC किस कारण बना उनका पसंदीदा Stock?, देखें वीडियो

Share Market से जुड़ी हर छोटी या बड़ी खबर, चाहे हो Nifty में आए नए हाई या फिर, हो आपके के लिए स्टॉक्स पर राय, बिजनेस न्यूज हो या पॉलिटिकल न्यूज, कोरोनावायरस की न्यूज हो या फिर इलेक्शन, देखें CNBC Awaaz और रहे हर खबर से updated.

items.title: ITC’s FMCG business on its own feet now: Sanjiv Puri
items.description: Margin expansion strategy is underpinned by scale, mix enrichment, says CMD

items.title: Market roundup: Sensex ends 80 points lower, Nifty at 18,017; check top gainers and losers
items.description: The top gainers were Bharti Airtel, Mahindra & Mahindra, Sun Pharma, Reliance, and ITC. The biggest losers were Indusind Bank, Tata Steel, Hindustan Unilever, Asian Paint, and Titan

items.title: ITC Hotels signs up first property in Udaipur under its new brand Mementos
items.description: Slated to open in the first quarter of next fiscal, the 130-room property is spread over 106 acres with each room offering a view of the beautiful panoramic Arravalis

items.title: Here’s how ‘Engage Fragrance Finder’ by ITC Engage is set to personalise the fragrance shopping experience
items.description: ITC Life Sciences and Technology Centre, utilizes a technology interface to match a fragrance to the consumer. Once the QR code is scanned or the link is clicked by the consumer, it leads the consumer to a finder platform to respond to a few questions.

items.title: CBIC asks GST officers to block ITC on basis of ‘material evidence’, not suspicion
items.description: The Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC) said the commissioner or an officer authorised by him must form an opinion for blocking of input tax credit only after “proper application of mind” considering all the facts of the case.
